document.title: Notice of Filing
document.case_name: U.S. v. Abitibi-Consolidated Inc. and Bowater Incorporated
document.text:
This document is available in three formats: this web page (for browsing content), PDF (comparable to original document formatting), and WordPerfect. To view the PDF you will need Acrobat Reader, which may be downloaded from the Adobe site. For an official signed copy, please contact the Antitrust Documents Group.
UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURTFOR THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA
UNITED STATES OF AMERICA,
Plaintiff,
v.
ABITIBI-CONSOLIDATED INC. and BOWATER INCORPORATED,
Defendants.
| | | | | | | | | | | | |
CASE NO.: JUDGE: DECK TYPE: Antitrust DATE STAMPED:
NOTICE OF FILING This is notice to the Court that on October 23, 2007, the United States caused a copy of the foregoing:
Certificate of Service, Complaint, Asset Preservation Stipulation and Order, Final Judgment, Competitive Impact Statement, and Plaintiff United States' Notice of Consent Decree Procedures to be filed with the Clerk of Court for the United States District Court for the District of Columbia.
Respectfully submitted,
_______________/s/________________Karl D. Knutsen, Esq.
U.S. Department of Justice
Antitrust Division
Litigation I Section
1401 H Street, NW, Suite 4000
Washington, DC 20530
(202) 514-0976

try { var pageTracker = _gat._getTracker("UA-36735731-1"); pageTracker._trackPageview(); } catch(err) {}
